problem_definition.command_line: shallow_water projection3.swml; shallow_water projection4.swml; shallow_water projection4.swml; shallow_water projection5.swml; shallow_water projection6.swml

variables.variable: import fluidity_tools errors = [] for filenumber in [3,4,5,6]: filename = projection+str(filenumber) s = fluidity_tools.stat_parser(filename+".stat") maxchange = s["MaxChange"]["value"][-1] errors.append(s['Fluid']['LayerThicknessError']['l2norm'][-1]) print errors
